text: Made of Bricks is the first album by the British singer-songwriter, Kate Nash. It was released on 6 August 2007 on Fiction Records. It reached number one in the UK album charts.The Sun, January 8 2008.http://uk.news.yahoo.com/itn/20070829/ten-nash-sets-sights-on-the-us- ea4616c_1.html The album was released five weeks earlier than first planned due to the popularity of the single "Foundations".PlayNME In its opening week of sales the album sold over 56,000 copies, and was certified gold.BBC.co.uk The album has now been certified Platinum in the UK for sales of over 300,000. It has sold over 450,000 copies worldwide. == Track listing == # "Play" - 1:11 # "Foundations" - 4:05 # "Mouthwash" - 5:01 # "Dickhead" - 3:42 # "Birds" - 4:25 # "We Get On" - 4:34 # "Mariella" - 4:15 # "Shit Song" - 3:05 # "Pumpkin Soup" - 2:59 # "Skeleton Song" - 5:07 # "Nicest Thing" - 4:05 # "Merry Happy/Little Red" - 13:10 (UK bonus track) === Bonus Tracks === * "A Is For Asthma" - 2:37 (Digital download bonus track) ==Chart positions== Chart (2007) Peak position UK Albums Chart 1 Irish Albums Chart 8 Belgian Albums Chart 16 United World Chart 23 German Albums Chart 38 Dutch Albums Chart 41 French Albums Chart 50 Austrian Albums Chart 51 Swiss Albums Chart 56 ==References== Category:2007 albums Category:Debut albums Category:Pop albums
title: Made of Bricks
